<p class=box>
[CNTS](#cnts) = particle counts per sample interval from the CN counter  
$\Delta t$ = interval
between recorded samples [s]  
$t_{d}$ = cumulative dead time during the sampling interval [s]  
$C_{flow}$ (see preceding box)    
[FCNC](#fcnc) = corrected sample flow rate (VLPM) for instrument conditions  
[PCN](#pcn) = internal pressure of the CN counter [hPa]  
[CNTEMP](#cntemp) = temperature of the optics block [$^{\circ}$C]  
[PSXC](./4-the-state-of-the-atmosphere.html#psx) = corrected ambient pressure [hPa]  
[ATX](./4-the-state-of-the-atmosphere.html#ambient-t) = ambient temperature [$^{\circ}$C]  
$T_{0}$ = 273.15\ K  
</p><p class=box2>
\begin{equation}
\mathrm{A=\frac{\{CNTS\}}{\mathrm{(\{FCNC\}\times C_{flow})}(\Delta t-t_{d})}}
(\#eq:CONCN2box1)
\end{equation}
\begin{equation}
\mathrm{\{CONCN\}}=A\frac{\mathrm{\{PSXC\}}}{\mathrm{\{PCN\}}}\frac{\mathrm{(\{CNTEMP\}}+T_{0})}{(\mathrm{\{ATX\}}+T_{0})}
(\#eq:cwCONCN2box2)
\end{equation}
</p>
